message: Let's start fair.  I'll take a slight majority, but you get a good chunk too.  What do you say?
Let's flip the script. I'll take a slight majority this time, but you still get a good chunk. It's only fair, right?
Okay, let's be reasonable.  We both get half, no more arguing.  It's the only way to ensure we both get a decent amount before inflation eats away at it.
